entry.title: OP_CODESEPARATOR Re: BIP Proposal: The Great Consensus Cleanup
entry.summary: Jacob Eliosoff inquired about the purpose of making OP_CODESEPARATOR non-standard if disabling it is not the objective. The response given was that it was done to reduce the risk of vulnerability caused by OP_CODESEPARATOR while a patch is being considered. This measure was taken to prevent it from being misused or mined easily.
